index.title: Contact
index.text:
Please select from the enquiry items below the one closest to your enquiry.
Please refrain from making enquiries for sales purposes.

products.title: For inquiries about Efficiera
products.text:
For more information on LeapMind products and to contact us, please use this form. It may take some time for us to respond or we may not be able to respond, depending on the content of your inquiry.
*Please do not contact us for marketing purposes.

event.title: For inquiries about press and requests for giving lectures
event.text:
If you have any questions about our products or joint development project,
or if you would like to interview us, please fill out the inquiry form below.
We will reply to you if necessary. Please do not contact us for marketing purposes.

recruit.title: For inquiries about jobs at LeapMind
recruit.text: For Inquiries about open positions and recruitment, please contact us via this form.

other.title: For inquiries about other matters (e.g. business and business cooperation)
other.text:
For inquiries related to business partnership and technology alliances, please use this form.
It may take some time for us to respond or we may not be able to respond, depending on the content of your inquiry.

complete.title: Thank you for your inquiry.
complete.text: Thank you for your inquiry. We will contact you as soon as possible.

items.item1: Yes, I need your latest information.

inquiry.label: Enquiry item
items: Ultra Low Power AI Accelerator IP Efficiera

yourProduct.label: Usages and Types of End products

items.industrial-machinery: Industrial machinery (ex. construction machinery, agricultural machinery, forklift)
items.home-appliances: Home appliance (ex. digital camera, TV, vacuum cleaner)

items: Articles of the magazines and newspapers

content.label: Message
content.caption: *When you request for further reference on Efficiera, please indicate that.

privacy1.text: Your personal information is used for managing your account and providing information related to the products and services you have requested. If you agree to receive contact from us about our products and services, please turn on the checkbox below.
privacy1.label: I agree to receive communications from LeapMind.

privacy2.text: We need to store and process your personal information in order to provide the information you've requested. If you agree to have your personal information stored for these purposes, please turn on the checkbox below.
privacy2.label: I agree to allow LeapMind to store and process my personal information.

privacy3.text1: For information on the use of personal data, please refer to
